original_text: You hypocrite, first take the log out of your own eye, and then you will see clearly to take the speck out of your brother's eye.
korean_text: 외식하는 자여 먼저 네 눈 속에서 들보를 빼어라 그 후에야 밝히 보고 형제의 눈 속에서 티를 빼리라

sentences.original_text: first take the log out of your own eye,
and then you will see clearly
to take the speck out of your brother's eye.
